channel.title: Organizing resources boards
channel.description:
http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,512560.msg3758570.html#msg3758570
After that topic, I'm interested in thoughts regarding reorganizing the Resources boards. Perhaps we should simply rename "Effects and Sprites" to 2D Artwork and Sprites, where it can encapsulate an entire forum of 2D artwork, ranging from help to requests, from 2D animated sprites to concept art.
Then I'm questioning whether we need Banners and Backgrounds if we have a more broad 2D artwork section. I still vote for it, because it's nice having a separation of artwork shared between 2D and 3D games in a section not particular to 2D or 3D.
And this also made me think, does the 3D Resources board cover animations? We never explicitly mention them.
